item.title: Highway litter, 5th February
item.description:
The litter from the GCHQ roundabout all the way to gloucester on the A40 is appalling - it has greatly increased over the winter and needs clearing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Arle Court Roundabout, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litterpicked bag of recycling litter next to bin ref:- 0230 which is just by the Greyhound pub traffic lights on the Cheltenham road., 5th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: At least 3 drains blocked, 5th February
item.description:
At least 3 of the drains before the M5 overbridge, heading towards Chruchdown are blocked and had flooded during rain on Tuesday
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brookfield Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
